CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Due_Date__c < TODAY(), OR(TEXT(Status__c) = "Not Started", TEXT(Status__c) = "In Progress")), "Past Due", IF(AND(Due_Date__c > TODAY(), Due_Date__c < TODAY() + 30, OR(TEXT(Status__c) = "Not Started", TEXT(Status__c) = "In Progress")),"Upcoming", ""))
CustomField.label: Current State
